code: import React from"react";import{contactDetails}from"../Details";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Contact(){const{email,phone}=contactDetails;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{className:"container mx-auto max-width section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-center text-2xl md:text-3xl lg:text-6xl text-dark-heading dark:text-light-heading font-semibold md:font-bold",children:"For any questions please drop a mail"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-center text-3xl md:text-4xl lg:text-6xl text-gradient font-semibold md:font-bold pt-5 md:pt-10 md:pb-6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:`mailto:${email}`,children:email})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-center text-content text-xl font-light block",children:"or"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-center text-3xl md:text-4xl lg:text-6xl text-gradient font-semibold md:font-bold pt-2 md:py-6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:`tel:${phone}`,children:phone})})]});}export default Contact;
